name: Work wad
description: This is an E2M1 wherein get to work with its two : elevators and stairs to 4 different floors. Oh yes, : I almost forgot to mention, there are various DOOM : sprites that you will meet on the way. Deal with : them as you wish. These levels were made on DOOM : version 1.666. While I realize that this level is : not of a totally original concept I've seen a : number of wads based on players' workplaces) : in this the work complex is nicely laid out.
